settings.title: Get in touch
settings.contact_text: Feel free to use our chat or send email to hello@rubyshines.com

settings.title: Donate A Pair To Families In Need
settings.text: RUBIES has been able to donate over 15% of all bikini bottoms to families all around the world through generous donations from people like you. Every girl should be able to have a bikini bottom no matter what their economic situation.

settings.title: Form-fitting clothing for trans girls.
settings.text: We want every active trans girl to be as confident and comfortable in her clothes as her friends.

settings.heading: Fabric and care
settings.content: The underwear should be close to standard US sizing.   If it seems far off of what you would have expected, contact us through our chat with the waist size measured under the belly button and we would be happy to help you pick.

settings.heading: 60 day risk free returns
